oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Comunicato Stampa - InterVeg, progetto in avvio
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ortolani, L
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Farming Systems
Biodiversity and ecosystem services
Environmental aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The document is a press release used to present to the italian press the starting project InterVeg founded by the CORE Organic II. Following this document 4 italian website wrote specific news about the project for the general public in the following days.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Ortolani, L (2011) Comunicato Stampa - InterVeg, progetto in avvio. [Press release - InterVeg, starting project.] www.greenews.info, 3 November 2011, p. 1.
